content.raw:
I've been testing Atlas with each physics engine, and dart is aborting on startup:
~~~
[ INFO] [1408060007.884967334, 0.022000000]: waitForService: Service [/gazebo/set_physics_properties] is now available.
Error [SDF.cc:789] Missing element description for [dart]
***** Internal Program Error - assertion (dartElem != __null) failed in virtual boost::any gazebo::physics::DARTPhysics::GetParam(const string&) const:
/home/scpeters/ws/everything/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/dart/DARTPhysics.cc(385): DART SDF element does not exist
~~~

It is caused by [DARTPhysics::GetParam, line 385](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/5d97111ac19934281d734ba134ddfa272ea3b25c/gazebo/physics/dart/DARTPhysics.cc?at=default#cl-381), which is looking for an sdf element named `dart` as a child of the world physics block. There is currently no such element in sdformat, which causes the `GZ_ASSERT` to fail.

We didn't notice this sooner because we don't have a test for PhysicsEngine::GetParam. I added such a test in 573e511 that fails for dart.
content.html:
I've been testing Atlas with each physics engine, and dart is aborting on startup:

[ INFO] [1408060007.884967334, 0.022000000]: waitForService: Service [/gazebo/set_physics_properties] is now available.
Error [SDF.cc:789] Missing element description for [dart]
***** Internal Program Error - assertion (dartElem != __null) failed in virtual boost::any gazebo::physics::DARTPhysics::GetParam(const string&) const:
/home/scpeters/ws/everything/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/dart/DARTPhysics.cc(385): DART SDF element does not exist

It is caused by DARTPhysics::GetParam, line 385, which is looking for an sdf element named dart as a child of the world physics block. There is currently no such element in sdformat, which causes the GZ_ASSERT to fail.

We didn't notice this sooner because we don't have a test for PhysicsEngine::GetParam. I added such a test in 573e511 that fails for dart.
